trans-unit.source: Represents a button that enables the user to switch between the different <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> modes within the property grid .
trans-unit.target: Representa um botão que permite que o usuário alternar entre os diferentes <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>modos dentro da grade de propriedade.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Determines what type of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode"></xref> to display upon receipt of a <xref:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs> event.
trans-unit.target: Determina que tipo de <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode"> </xref> para exibir no recebimento de uma <xref:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs>evento.</xref:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty> has changed (or gained or lost) its owning <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> and if that is <xref:System.Boolean.True>, sets up the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> to be the mode to switch to.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty>foi alterado (ou obtido ou perdido) seu proprietário <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>e é que <xref:System.Boolean.True>, configura o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>seja o modo para alternar para.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> </xref:System.Boolean.True> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, means that the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> will be calculated automatically to match the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode*> of the owning <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que, quando <xref:System.Boolean.True>, significa que o <> </> *> serão calculados automaticamente para corresponder a <> </> *> de propriedade de <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> </xref:System.Boolean.True>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> property.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, para alternar para o modo se baseará o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>propriedade.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> will switch automatically to the edit mode of its <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"> </xref> alternará automaticamente para o modo de edição de seu <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>

trans-unit.source: Registers the dependency property which, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, means that the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> will be calculated automatically to match the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode*> of the owning <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Registra a propriedade de dependência que, quando <xref:System.Boolean.True>, significa que o <> </> *> serão calculados automaticamente para corresponder a <> </> *> de propriedade de <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> </xref:System.Boolean.True>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> property.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, para alternar para o modo se baseará o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>propriedade.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>

trans-unit.source: The edit mode to switch to when the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O modo de edição para alternar para quando o <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"> </xref> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: Registers the dependency property that gets or sets the targeted mode when the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Registra a propriedade de dependência que obtém ou define o modo de destino quando o <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"> </xref> é clicado.
